wikipedia_page.main: Lesley Jane Yellowlees,  (born 1953) is a British inorganic chemist conducting research in Spectroelectrochemistry, Electron transfer reactions and Electron paramagnetic resonance (EPR) Spectroscopy. Yellowlees was also elected as the president of the Royal Society of Chemistry 2012–14 and was the first woman to hold that role .

response: * Lesley Yellowlees, inorganic chemist and was the first female president of the Royal Society of Chemistry

response: * Lesley Yellowlees CBE, first female president of the Royal Society of Chemistry, Vice-President of the University of Edinburgh
